transcoder.name: Android HQ
transcoder.description: A high quality profile for fast connections and fast CPUs
transcoder.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 1024k -profile baseline -preset fast -acodec aac -ab 256k -ac 2 -strict experimental -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoder.name: Android Better
transcoder.description: A high quality profile for fast connections.
transcoder.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 768k -profile baseline -preset veryfast -acodec aac -ab 128k -ac 2 -strict experimental -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoder.name: Android Medium
transcoder.description: A profile that balances quality and bandwidth. For fast network data connections or slow wifi.
transcoder.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 512k -profile baseline -preset veryfast -acodec aac -ab 128k -ac 2 -strict experimental -threads 2 -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoder.name: Android LQ
transcoder.description: A low-quality profile for Android devices with very slow connections
transcoder.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 256k -profile baseline -preset veryfast -acodec aac -ab 64k -ac 2 -strict experimental -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoder.name: Flash LQ
transcoder.description: Profile for LQ streaming in WebMediaPortal
transcoder.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 3500k -preset ultrafast -profile baseline -acodec aac -strict experimental -ab 128k -threads 4 -async 1 -f flv

transcoder.name: Flash HQ
transcoder.description: Profile for HQ streaming in WebMediaPortal
transcoder.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 6000k -preset ultrafast -profile baseline -acodec aac -strict experimental -ab 256k -threads 4 -async 1 -f flv
